title: zksync-cli bridge deposit causes the server panic
body:
### üêõ Bug Report
zksync-cli bridge deposit cause the eth tx manager send error. And then the server will panic once proof got submitted to the L1.

#### üìù Description

Deployed local dev network with gpu fri prover, finished the genesis block proof. Tries to send some eth from L1 to L2.

#### üîÑ Reproduction Steps
1. `zk init` to setup local dev net, wait the genesis block proof finished.
2. run `zksync-cli bridge deposit  [some address]`
3. check balance of the address, the address in L2 got the value transfered.
4. the server log shows send transaction nonce too low
5. Wait another block proof submitted to L1
6. server panic.

#### ü§î Expected Behavior

the eth tx manager should sent tx without error and the server will not panic.

#### üòØ Current Behavior

not sure the transaction sent from the eth tx manager for. But it happens after the cli bridge deposit. And the server go panic later on.

#### üñ•Ô∏è Environment

zksync-era: core-v_boojnet_1.12.0
zksync-cli: 0.7.1

#### üìé Log Output

Cli terminal
```
~$ zksync-cli bridge deposit
? Chain to use Local Dockerized node
? Amount of ETH to deposit (eg. 0.1) 100
? Private key of the sender [hidden]
? Recipient address on L2 (0x address) 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266

Deposit:
 From: 0xde03a0B5963f75f1C8485B355fF6D30f3093BDE7 (L1 Local)
 To: 0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266 (Local Dockerized node)
 Amount: 100 ETH

Sending deposit transaction...

Deposit sent:
 Transaction hash: 0xd6f472a4077354788a598b43059914be7d1a913aeef6fb5557ac54dc2c5d3f8c

Sender L1 balance after transaction: 99999999999999996796.61772155459479787 ETH
```
Zk Server log

After the second compression proof submitted
Server panic log
